Constructors

constructor

  • new OpenKitBuilder(beaconURL: string, applicationId: string, deviceId: number | string): OpenKitBuilder
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:72

    Creates a new OpenKitBuilder

    Parameters

    • beaconURL: string

      The url to the beacon endpoint

    • applicationId: string

      The id of the custom application

    • deviceId: number | string

      The id of the current device, which must be a number between 1 and 19 digits inclusive.

    Returns OpenKitBuilder

withCrashReportingLevel

  • withCrashReportingLevel(crashReportingLevel: CrashReportingLevel): this
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:169

    Sets the flag if crash reporting is enabled

    Off (0) - No crashes are reported OptOutCrashes = (1) - No crashes are reported OptInCrashes = (2) - Crashes are reported

    If an invalid value is passed, it is ignored.

    Parameters

    • crashReportingLevel: CrashReportingLevel

    Returns this

withDataCollectionLevel

  • withDataCollectionLevel(dataCollectionLevel: DataCollectionLevel): this
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:143

    Sets the data collection level.

    Depending on the chosen level the amount and granularity of data sent is controlled. Off (0) - no data collected Performance (1) - only performance related data is collected UserBehavior (2) - all available RUM data including performance related data is collected..

    If an invalid value is passed, it is ignored.

    Default value is UserBehavior (2)

    Parameters

    • dataCollectionLevel: DataCollectionLevel

      The data collection level

    Returns this

    The current OpenKitBuilder

withScreenOrientation

  • withScreenOrientation(orientation: Orientation): this
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:279

    Sets the screen orientation. Allowed values are Orientation.Portrait ('p') and Orientation.Landscape ('l'). All other values are ignored.

    Parameters

    • orientation: Orientation

      The orientation. 'p' || 'l'.

    Returns this

withScreenResolution

  • withScreenResolution(width: number, height: number): this
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:260

    Sets the screen resolution. If the width or height are not positive finite numbers, both are ignored.

    Parameters

    • width: number

      The width of the screen

    • height: number

      The height of the screen

    Returns this

withUserLanguage

  • withUserLanguage(language: string): this
    • Defined in OpenKitBuilder.ts:246

    Sets the user language. If the language is not a string or empty string, it is ignored. Currently, there are no restrictions on RFC/ISO codes.

    Parameters

    • language: string

      The user language

    Returns this
